mapper.insert: insert into t_umbrella(ubox_seq, umb_status, umb_broken, umb_rfid, umb_type) values (#{ubox_seq}, #{umb_status}, #{umb_broken}, #{umb_rfid}, #{umb_type});
mapper.update: update t_umbrella set umb_status = #{umb_status} where umb_seq = #{umb_seq}
update t_umbrella set umb_broken = #{umb_broken} where umb_seq = #{umb_seq}
update t_umbrella set umb_check = now() where umb_seq = #{umb_seq}
update t_umbrella set umb_rfid = #{umb_rfid} where umb_seq = #{umb_seq}
